sentences.en: Cuddle your cats and get over your headache, Bethy.
sentences.cn: 抱上你的猫,头痛就会好了, 贝思.

sentences.en: Dawn and her boyfriend were cuddling on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 唐和她的男朋友在沙发上搂搂抱抱。

sentences.en: He just wants a comforting kiss and a cuddle and he'll be all right.
sentences.cn: 他只想要别人安慰地吻他一下、抱他一下,这样他就会好起来.

sentences.en: I can cuddle with someone, with my blanket or stuffed animal.
sentences.cn: 我可以抱着我的小毛毯或是小布偶靠在妈妈的怀里.

sentences.en: It was you who heaved us to cuddle the fascination of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 是您举着我们抚摩语言的魅力.

sentences.en: Just to hold it and cuddle with it.
Let my mind dwell for rest and cuddle up.
My mother gave me a cuddle before I went to bed.
sentences.cn: 我上床睡觉前妈妈拥抱了我.

sentences.en: Now they were home. Mama Mouse gave her baby, Little Mouse, cuddle.
sentences.cn: 现在他们回到温暖的家里, 鼠妈妈轻轻地拥抱了小老鼠一下.

sentences.en: She likes to cuddle her doll.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢抚抱她的洋娃娃.

sentences.en: The cubs cuddle up together for warmth.
The little girl picked up her pet dog and cuddle it.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩抱起她心爱的小狗亲昵地搂着.

sentences.en: Then we'd go home and cuddle up together to watch TV.
sentences.cn: 然后我们就回家，依偎在一起看电视。

sentences.en: They used to kiss and cuddle in front of everyone.
sentences.cn: 他们过去经常在人前搂抱亲吻。

sentences.en: What fine sky, it cuddle me with its rich bosom.
sentences.cn: 晴朗的天空, 向我敞开博大的胸怀.

words.tran_cn: 令人想拥抱的；喜欢搂搂抱抱的；逗人喜爱的
拥抱；亲热地搂住；抚爱地拥抱

trans.tran_en: to hold someone or something very close to you with your arms around them, especially to show that you love them
